players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob was found dead last night, so we lost a town member already. We need to be careful and watch how everyone is acting. Charlie and Diana, what do you think about who might be suspicious?"
Charlie: "I'm shocked Bob is gone already. Alice, you're quick to start questioning others - that seems a bit eager. Let's all share our thoughts first before pointing fingers."
Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and found out the truth. We need to vote him out now to protect the town."
You: "Diana, if you really investigated Charlie and found him suspicious, why haven't you shared any details or proof? We need more than just accusations to make a decision."
Diana: "Diana here. I understand the need for proof, but my investigation is secret and only I can confirm it. Voting out Charlie now is our best chance to save the town."

Charlie: "Diana, you're claiming to be detective but your story doesn't add up. A real detective would be more careful about revealing themselves so early. This feels like a desperate mafia play to frame an innocent."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
